  "investment_thesis": "Base case underwriting assumes steady European growth (AMS ~7% CAGR, ECS ~5% CAGR) and faster expansion in Americas & Asia, with margins held broadly in line with 2020E segment gross margins and 2020E opex ratios. At an 8.0x entry and 3.5x leverage, the deal generates ~9% IRR / ~1.54x MOIC on an 8.0x exit, implying returns are highly dependent on either multiple expansion, higher growth (especially Americas & Asia), and/or margin improvement beyond the 2020E baseline."
}

parsed_response.investment_thesis: Base case underwriting assumes steady European growth (AMS ~7% CAGR, ECS ~5% CAGR) and faster expansion in Americas & Asia, with margins held broadly in line with 2020E segment gross margins and 2020E opex ratios. At an 8.0x entry and 3.5x leverage, the deal generates ~9% IRR / ~1.54x MOIC on an 8.0x exit, implying returns are highly dependent on either multiple expansion, higher growth (especially Americas & Asia), and/or margin improvement beyond the 2020E baseline.
